entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is eyeing Bill with great interest over her mother's shoulder. She has no objection to long hair or earrings with fangs on them.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is looking around the chamber and asking about the picture of Sir Cadogan.

entities.name: violet
entities.description: Violet, the Fat Lady's friend, winks at Bill from her frame.

entities.name: the fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is mentioned as a person who gave Mrs. Weasley a telling off in the past.

entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is a mad knight whose picture is still around.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley has always refrained from criticizing the Dursleys in front of Harry.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as a family that Mrs. Weasley criticizes.

relationships.description: Fleur Delacour is eyeing Bill with great interest over her mother's shoulder.
Bill asks about the picture of Sir Cadogan.
Mrs. Weasley has always refrained from criticizing the Dursleys in front of Harry.
